description: A potential remote denial of service security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Integrated Lights Out 4 prior to v2.60 and iLO 5 for Gen 10 servers prior to v1.30.

product.name: HPE Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) for HPE Gen10 Servers, HPE Integrated Lights-Out 4 (iLO 4)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: iLO 4 prior to v2.26, iLO5 prior to v1.30
